public interface IPullToRefresh<T extends View>

demo()
getCurrentMode()
getFilterTouchEvents()
getLoadingLayoutProxy()
getLoadingLayoutProxy(boolean, boolean)
getMode()
getRefreshableView()         ------  返回真正的列表控件
getShowViewWhileRefreshing()
getState()
isPullToRefreshEnabled()
isPullToRefreshOverScrollEnabled()
isRefreshing()
isScrollingWhileRefreshingEnabled()
onRefreshComplete()
setFilterTouchEvents(boolean)
setMode(Mode)
setOnPullEventListener(OnPullEventListener<T>)
setOnRefreshListener(OnRefreshListener<T>)
setOnRefreshListener(OnRefreshListener2<T>)
setPullToRefreshOverScrollEnabled(boolean)
setRefreshing()
setRefreshing(boolean)
setScrollAnimationInterpolator(Interpolator)
setScrollingWhileRefreshingEnabled(boolean)
setShowViewWhileRefreshing(boolean)
